metaData.label: Marketing Prospect?
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Teacher/Educator OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Principal OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head  Teacher OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Support OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of Mathematics OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of ICT OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal School District Employee OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Head of English/Literacy

metaData.label: B2C?
metaData.criteriaDescription: CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Parent OR CampaignMember:Common:Title equal Home schooling parent
